ai-tha-ap365:2.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap365:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap365:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap365:3.4_0: this is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap365:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āḷavī.
ai-tha-ap365:6.1_0: The third consecrated for the Elder Nuns,
